entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
